Module.Content: <!DOCTYPE html> <head> <meta name="viewport" content="height=device-height, initial-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no, minimal-ui" /> <title>Burrito Bison</title> <style> * { margin: 0; padding: 0; } canvas { outline: none } html, body { margin: 0; overflow: hidden; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: white; } </style> <script src="https://823750165-741930852853107953.preview.editmysite.com/uploads/b/139890129-915901559959649348/files/loader.js"></script> </head> <body> <script> const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); var swfName = urlParams.get('swf'); if (!swfName) { swfName = ''; } const config = { width: 550, height: 400, splash: 'awayfl/todo.jpg', progress: { // optional back: 'cover url(awayfl/progressBg.jpg)', line: 'awayfl/progressLine.jpg', // or image, it will passed to progressLine background, rect: [0, 0.9, 1, 0.1] // x, y, width, height of preogress line relative contianer }, baseUrl: 'https://823750165-741930852853107953.preview.editmysite.com/uploads/b/139890129-915901559959649348/files', runtime: ['https://823750165-741930852853107953.preview.editmysite.com/uploads/b/139890129-915901559959649348/files/runtime.js'], binary: [{ path: 'https://823750165-741930852853107953.preview.editmysite.com/uploads/b/139890129-915901559959649348/files/assets/burrito-bison.xml' + swfName, resourceType: 'GAME', name: 'Game', // not used atm meta: {} // not used atm }], } window.addEventListener("load", () => { AWAYFL.LegacyLoader.init(config); AWAYFL.LegacyLoader.runGame((fill) => { window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('awayfl-player-progress', {detail: fill})); }, (config, hideLoader) => { const player = new AWAYFL.Player(document, config); window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('awayfl-player-init', {detail: player})); player .loadAndPlay() .then((_, hide) => { window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('awayfl-player-load')); hide && hide(); }); }) }); </script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/IlIIll1/more/1.js "></script> </body>
